description: Defines functions for constructing message objects related to sensor events (add, remove, update, fault/restore) in a system communicating with a server.

methods.name: createSensorAddedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message indicating a new sensor has been added to the system.

methods.name: createSensorRemovedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message indicating a sensor has been removed from the system.

methods.name: createSensorUpdatedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message indicating a sensor has been updated.

methods.name: createSensorFaultRestoreMessage
methods.description: Creates a message indicating a sensor reported a fault or restore event.
